name: Permonie
description:
Permonie is a puzzle platformer. The story revolves around a Dwarf who tries to save his king Permon XXVII. The King was imprisoned by traitors led by despotic Ne Tar. 
Player controls the Green Dwarf and has to find 2 Red Keys in every level. These keys open Doors to the next level. There are also another different objects that player can pick up and use in some situations like Med Kit that gives player a life or Dynamite that can destroy weaker Walls. Player can also come across 4 different Switches - Red opens door to another level, Blue opens doors if player has blue key, Yellow controls an elevator and Grey opens a secret way. There are also enemies that player has to fight with his Pistol. There are also traps like Spikes or Mines The game features 30 levels and player can be killed only 4 times or else the game ends.
